Uses of Package
edu.rit.pj2

  • Packages that use edu.rit.pj2 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.gpu.example
    Package edu.rit.gpu.example contains example programs illustrating how to do GPU parallel programming with the Parallel Java 2 Library.
    edu.rit.gpu.test
    Package edu.rit.gpu.test contains unit test programs for the classes in package edu.rit.gpu.
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.
    edu.rit.pj2.example
    Package edu.rit.pj2.example contains example programs illustrating how to do parallel programming with the Parallel Java 2 Library.
    edu.rit.pj2.test
    Package edu.rit.pj2.test contains unit test programs for the classes in package edu.rit.pj2.
    edu.rit.pj2.tracker
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tracker contains classes for the Parallel Java 2 (PJ2) Tracker and related classes.
    edu.rit.pj2.tuple
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tuple contains general-purpose subclasses of class Tuple.
    edu.rit.pj2.vbl
    Package edu.rit.pj2.vbl contains general-purpose reduction variable classes that implement interface Vbl.
    edu.rit.pjmr
    Package edu.rit.pjmr contains Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR), a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2.
    edu.rit.pjmr.example
    Package edu.rit.pjmr.example contains example programs using Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR) a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2, in package edu.rit.pjmr.
  • Classes in edu.rit.pj2 used by edu.rit.gpu.example 
    Class and Description
    Task
    Class Task is the abstract base class for a PJ2 task.
  • Classes in edu.rit.pj2 used by edu.rit.gpu.test 
    Class and Description
    Task
    Class Task is the abstract base class for a PJ2 task.
  • Classes in edu.rit.pj2 used by edu.rit.pj2 
    Class and Description
    Chunk
    Class Chunk is a Tuple specifying the iterations of a loop with an index of type int.
    Debug
    Enum Debug specifies various debugging messages that can be turned on or off in a PJ2 Job.
    IntParallelForLoop
    Class IntParallelForLoop provides a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads, with a loop index of type int.
    IteratorParallelForLoop
    Class IteratorParallelForLoop provides a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads, looping over the elements in an iterator or an iterable collection.
    LongChunk
    Class LongChunk is a Tuple specifying the iterations of a loop with an index of type long.
    LongLoop
    Class LongLoop is the abstract base class for a loop body executed by a parallel for loop with a long integer index.
    LongParallelForLoop
    Class LongParallelForLoop provides a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads, with a loop index of type long.
    Loop
    Class Loop is the abstract base class for a loop body executed by a parallel for loop with an integer index.
    LoopBody
    Class LoopBody is the abstract base class for a loop body executed by a parallel for loop.
    ObjectLoop
    Class ObjectLoop is the abstract base class for a loop body executed by a parallel for loop over the elements in an iterator or an iterable collection.
    ParallelForLoop
    Class ParallelForLoop is the abstract base class for a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads.
    ParallelStatement
    Class ParallelStatement is the abstract base class for a parallel statement executed by multiple threads.
    Rule
    Class Rule provides a PJ2 rule.
    Rule.Matcher
    Interface Rule.Matcher specifies the interface for an object that matches an on-demand Rule's templates against the tuples in tuple space.
    Schedule
    Enum Schedule specifies the schedule for partitioning the iterations of a work sharing parallel for loop among multiple threads.
    Section
    Class Section is the abstract base class for a section of code executed in parallel with other sections.
    Task
    Class Task is the abstract base class for a PJ2 task.
    TaskSpec
    Class TaskSpec provides a task specification that is part of a Rule in a Job.
    Tuple
    Class Tuple is the base class for a tuple.
    TupleSpace.Transaction
    Class TupleSpace.Transaction provides a transaction for finding and removing Tuples from TupleSpace.
    TupleSpace.TupleRef
    Class TupleSpace.TupleRef provides a reference to a tuple in tuple space.
    Vbl
    Interface Vbl specifies the interface for a variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
    WorkerParallelForLoop
    Class WorkerParallelForLoop provides the worker portion of a master-worker cluster parallel for loop.
  • Classes in edu.rit.pj2 used by edu.rit.pj2.example 
    Class and Description
    Job
    Class Job is the abstract base class for a PJ2 job.
    Task
    Class Task is the abstract base class for a PJ2 task.
    Vbl
    Interface Vbl specifies the interface for a variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
